text:
Hi All,

Has anyone done anything to capture an unique id per contact/visitor that can also tie in to user data in google analytics?
Is this even acceptable practice given GDPR requirements.

I’m thinking the easiest value to capture might be a users google analytics ID

Hi! A newbie here who would appreciate some guidance. I'm aware that the Drag and drop template is outdated, but need to help a client update an existing page template built as a "Drag and drop template".

*Question:* Is it possible to add a block with custom HTML to the "Drag and drop template" nowadays? I can see that the client have som Module Groups with Custom HTML blocks (see print screen), but it seems like it's not possible to add a new custom code block to a Module Group - can anyone confirm? Or is it possible somehow?
<@U03AKL6Q1B2> Yes, it’s a real one. This is it: <http://nwwineco.com|nwwineco.com>

<@U01U201MTQF> interesting, and are you using a real email, or similar to the screenshot something like "username@" - the server can detect globally bounced emails, so I would start there if you haven't already
It was an actual email. I realized this when a user reached out letting me know that they cannot submit the form. I’ll dm you the email since I cannot publish it here.

Hi Everyone. I need some help. I am a total newbie to HubSpot developing and I have been reading through all the developer documentation. I want to create a panel or custom card on the activities view on individual companies that show the growth and renewal pipelines and filter them by date. But I cannot seem to figure out how to pull the pipeline data

Hello :wave:

I'm a PM in HubSpot's developer product group and want to chat with a handful of devs regarding their overall workflow/"dev-ops" process. Focused mainly on HubSpot integration/customization work and would like to learn about the stack and tools you use, why you use them, and how they impact (_perceived or measured_) your productivity as a HubSpot developer.

If you're up for a ~30-minute chat, be it async or <https://meetings.HubSpot.com/casey-iannone|zoom>, feel free to shoot me a dm or drop a line in the :thread:

Hey guys! I made a little site and then checked it out on mobile and the menu button is not showing up! I could really use some help in seeing what is up because we all know most people access things from their photos. <http://hillshall.com|hillshall.com>
Hi Thomas, did you find a home for those tickets?
